abstract: The subpoena of Johnson & Johnson broadens an investigation that has touched its competitors Abbott Laboratories and Boston Scientific.
snippet: The subpoena of Johnson & Johnson broadens an investigation that has touched its competitors Abbott Laboratories and Boston Scientific.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson said on Monday that it had been subpoenaed by the Justice Department in connection with its sales of bile duct stents, broadening an investigation that has touched its competitors Abbott Laboratories and Boston Scientific.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Receives Subpoena on Bile Duct Stents
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Receives Subpoena on Bile Duct Stents
